translation.en: [girl] Hi. Or should that be: [in British accent] How do you do?
[chuckles] [in normal voice] I'm Zoe. I'm 15 and--
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Zoe. J'ai 15 ans et...

translation.en: Uh, guys? Guys? Wrong girl.
translation.fr: Ohé ! Les amis ?Vous regardez la mauvaise fille.

translation.en: I'm the out-of-place American over here,
translation.fr: Je suis là. L'Américaine un peu perdue.

translation.en: and this is England.
Beautiful, isn't it?
This place smells of cow.
[Zoe] Yeah, now you come to mention it, there's a definite aroma.
translation.fr: Oui, maintenant que tu le dis,il y a une légère odeur.

translation.en: That's my little sister, Rosie.
She's more LA than a wannabe actor sipping on kale juice.
translation.fr: Une starlette comme Los Angelesn'en fait plus.

translation.en: We've been walking for days.
Are we lost?
I know these roads like the back of my hand. I'm not lost.
translation.fr: Je connais cet endroit comme ma poche.Je ne suis pas perdue.

translation.en: [Zoe] That's my mom. She's totally lost, in more ways than one.
translation.fr: Là, c'est ma mère. Elle est complètementperdue, dans plusieurs domaines.

translation.en: -Ooh, look at that. -[bird squawking]
Is that a buzzard?
[Zoe] And that, my friends, is a really big horse.
translation.fr: Et ça, les amis, c'est un cheval énorme.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[Rosie gasps]
[Zoe] Sorry. Hope my sister didn't get in the way of your massive horse.
translation.fr: Désolée. J'espère que ma petite sœurne s'est pas mise sur ton chemin.

translation.en: My party shoes.
Did someone say party?
-Gramps! -[Frank] Zoe!
But how wonderful to see you!
translation.fr: Je suis ravi de te voir.

translation.en: Ah. I thought you were going to camp. Where's your dad?
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu allais en colonie.Et ton père ?

translation.en: Long story.
Dad, you're not supposed to be driving.
translation.fr: Papa, tu n'es pas censé conduire.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be driving a car.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas censé conduireune voiture.

translation.en: This isn't a car.
-Now, who wants a lift to the house? -[Rosie] Me.
Get on the back there. Right, that's it.
translation.fr: Monte à l'arrière. Oui, c'est ça.

translation.en: Welcome home.
[Rosie] Hit the gas, Gramps.
[Maggie] Don't encourage him.
Dad, slow down!
[Zoe] Things in LA got kind of complicated kind of quickly.
translation.fr: Les choses se sont compliquéesassez rapidement, à Los Angeles.

translation.en: And I figure a summer vacay
translation.fr: Et je me suis dit que des vacances

translation.en: on a tiny island off the coast of England is just what I need.
translation.fr: sur une minuscule île anglaiseétaient ce dont j'avais besoin.

translation.en: Zero parental stress, zero weirdly possessive friends
translation.fr: Zéro stress parental,zéro amie étrangement possessive

translation.en: -and absolutely zero drama. -[tires squealing]
[Rosie] Gramps, watch out!
[Rosie] It's okay, I'm fine.
Hmm, I'll get back to you about that whole zero drama thing.
translation.fr: On reparlera du "zéro drame" plus tard.

translation.en: ♪ No matter what you're doin' ♪
[Frank] Come in, come in, come in, come in.
Yeah, yeah. Put it down.
It's all exactly the same.
[Frank] This is new.
-What do you think? -That is very British.
So, what happened to Huck?
-Oh, Dad's working. -Yeah, really hard. [chuckles]
-It's all good, though. I have his ticket. -You'd really rather spend the summer
translation.fr: - Mais tout va bien. J'ai pris son billet.- Tu préfères passer l'été

translation.en: with your old grandpa than your friends?
translation.fr: chez ton papyplutôt qu'avec tes amis ?

translation.en: Yeah. They'll be there when I get back.
translation.fr: Oui. Ils seront encore là à mon retour.

translation.en: Probably.
Mmm. Smells good, Gramps. What are you cooking?
translation.fr: Ça sent bon, papy.Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

translation.en: -Rabbit. -Mom, Grandpa's cooking Peter Rabbit.
translation.fr: - Du lapin.- Papy fait cuire Pierre Lapin.

translation.en: -Couldn't you have done egg and chips? -She should know what real food is.
translation.fr: Tu n'aurais pas pu faire des frites ? Elle doit goûter de vrais produits.

translation.en: I suppose it's all rehydrated tofu burgers in LA.
translation.fr: Je suppose que vous mangezdes hamburgers au tofu réhydraté à LA.

translation.en: Are you really going there already?
[Frank] I'm just saying, it'll be good for them to spend time somewhere real.
translation.fr: Ça va leur faire du bien de passerdu temps dans le monde réel.

translation.en: Somewhere with a bit of soul.
-[Maggie] LA has soul, too. -Oh. [Maggie] If you'd get on a plane, I could show you.
translation.fr: LA a une âme aussi. Si tu voulais bienprendre l'avion, je te montrerais.

translation.en: -[Frank] The last thing I need is LA. -Perfect.
translation.fr: - Je n'ai pas besoin d'aller à LA.- Parfait.

translation.en: [Frank] I'm doing fine.
[Zoe] "Dear Maggie. The light will come through again. Love, Mama."
translation.fr: "Chère Maggie. La lumièreressurgira un jour. Je t'aime, maman."

translation.en: Cryptic. I like it.
[Rosie] Mom, why isn't the Wi-Fi working?
translation.fr: Pourquoi le wifi ne fonctionne pas ?

translation.en: -[Frank] What's a Wi-Fi? -[Rosie] Mom!
That's it. That's it. I'm calling the embassy.
Wi-Fi is a basic human right.
translation.fr: Le wifi est un droit fondamental.

translation.en: [Zoe] This is what I wanted, what I needed.
translation.fr: Voilà ce que je voulais.Ce dont j'avais besoin.

translation.en: Just peace and quiet and...
Hello, jet lag.
-Rosie's missing. -[sighs]
-[Maggie] I've looked everywhere. -She's probably gone-- ugh! For a walk.
translation.fr: - Je l'ai cherchée partout.- Elle a dû aller se promener.

translation.en: -Rosie doesn't do walks. -[Maggie] She doesn't know these roads.
translation.fr: - C'est pas son genre.- Elle ne connaît pas le coin.

translation.en: -She doesn't know the dangers. -We're getting a little hysterical.
translation.fr: - C'est dangereux.- Je pense que nous paniquons un peu vite.

translation.en: -She's only been gone five minutes. -Grandpa, please, not helping.
translation.fr: - Elle est partie depuis cinq minutes.- Papy, ça n'aide pas.

translation.en: Mom, relax, breathe. [inhales]
Remember your Yogalates. [exhales]
translation.fr: Pense à tes cours de Yogalates.

translation.en: Right, yes. My breathing. Uh...
I'll go wait by the phone.
I'll find her. She couldn't have gone far.
translation.fr: Je vais voir. Elle ne doit pas être loin.

translation.en: -Is your mother always this... -Recently, yes.
translation.fr: - Ta mère est toujours...- Ces derniers temps, oui.

translation.en: You're not really here to nurse your invalid grandfather, are you?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas là pour prendre soinde ton grand-père invalide, pas vrai ?

translation.en: -No, Grandpa. -Thank goodness for that.
-I gotta go find Rosie. -Yeah.
[Zoe] This place is so beautiful.
It needs a coffee shop right there, but other than that, all good.
translation.fr: Il manque quand même un cafémais, sinon, c'est superbe.

translation.en: Ow. Excuse me, hi.
Hey, um, I don't suppose you've seen a ten-year-old girl about yea high,
translation.fr: Vous n'auriez pas vu une fille de 10 ans,grande comme ça,

translation.en: resembles an angry ball of glitter?
translation.fr: une boule de colère à paillettes ?

translation.en: -You're American. -Oh, no, no, no, I'm French.
translation.fr: - Tu es américaine ?- Non, je suis française.

translation.en: Really?
[Zoe] Is she serious?
I've never met a French person before.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais rencontré de Français.

translation.en: Bonjour, stranger.
[Zoe] Oh, she's serious.
Okay, so, you haven't seen her?
Just because she's my little sister and she's on the loose.
translation.fr: C'est ma petite sœur.Elle est perdue dans la nature.

translation.en: No, but we'll keep an eye out.
-Okay, all right. Thank you. Thank you. -Wait, wait, wait. Um...
What are you-- Why-- Um--
Translation: Who are you and what are you doing here?
translation.fr: Traduction :qui es-tu et que fais-tu ici ?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm Zoe.
I'm staying here for the summer at my gramps' house, over there.
translation.fr: Je passe l'été chez mon grand-père,par là-bas.

translation.en: That's right by the stables. You should totally come and hang out.
You know, I'm not exactly what you'd call outdoorsy.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas vraimentfan des activités de plein air.

translation.en: It's not all outdoorsy. Some of it's indoorsy.
translation.fr: Il y a aussi des activités en intérieur.

translation.en: Yeah, it's pony camp soon.
translation.fr: Il va y avoir un stage de poney.

translation.en: Which is gonna be horsesome.
Horsesome's my word.
-It's a combination of horse and awesome. -Got it.
[woman] Girls!
Raven's escaped.
-What? -I want everyone back in the yard now.
-He's been stolen. He must have been. -You don't know that.
translation.fr: - Il a été volé. C'est sûr.- Tu n'en sais rien.

translation.en: The security in this place is utterly inadequate.
translation.fr: La sécurité ici laisse à désirer.J'appelle la police.

translation.en: -I'm gonna call the police -Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
translation.fr: La sécurité ici laisse à désirer.J'appelle la police. Ne nous emballons pas.

translation.en: -I'll drive around, see if I can find him. -[Zoe] Am I in a Jane Austen novel?
translation.fr: - Je le retrouverai.- Suis-je dans un roman de Jane Austen ?

translation.en: Have I gone back in time?
-What is this place? -[Sam] Marcus.
[Zoe] You've got to be kidding me.
No one looks like that in real life.
translation.fr: Personne ne ressemble à çadans la vraie vie.

translation.en: -Did I say that out loud? -Huh?
Let's hope Raven comes quietly.
Who's Raven?
-He's-- -Just a horse.
-[Becky] A scary horse. -I'm really worried, Daddy.
translation.fr: - Un cheval.- Un cheval effrayant. Je suis très inquiète, papa.Il est hors de contrôle.

translation.en: He's totally out of control.
translation.fr: Je suis très inquiète, papa.Il est hors de contrôle.

translation.en: I'm sure your sister will be fine.
translation.fr: Je suis sûre que ta sœur va bien.

translation.en: -Can I borrow this? -[Becky] Of course.
Uh, that's my bike.
Be careful.
That girl is the definition of horsesome.
It'll catch on, Jade. Just you wait.
translation.fr: Ce mot va devenir tendance, Jade.Tu verras.

translation.en: [Zoe] Okay, detective mode engaged.
Where would a very small, very angry little sister hide?
translation.fr: Où peut bien se cacherune toute petite sœur en colère ?

translation.en: Okay, let's see.
Pier, picturesque.
But no Rosie.
Woods, whole lot of trees.
No Rosie.
Oh, God, no.
Oh, no, please don't hurt her.
translation.fr: Ne lui fais pas de mal, pitié.

translation.en: -That's the girl looking for her sister. -Rope and sedatives now, Marcus.
translation.fr: - C'est la fille qui cherche sa sœur.- Une corde et un tranquillisant.

translation.en: Just stay very still!
You must be Raven. Okay.
It's okay, it's okay.
It's okay.
Okay, okay, okay. Relax, relax.
It's all okay.
It's okay.
Wait, wait, wait. Look.
I've never seen him so calm.
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai jamais vu aussi calme.

translation.en: Rough day, huh?
Just stay very still.
Stop it, don't be like that. Your friends are here to take you home.
translation.fr: Arrête, ne fais pas ça.Tes amis vont te ramener chez toi.

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey, Britain's Next Top Model... I don't think he likes that pointy thing.
translation.fr: Hé, le futur mannequin...Il n'a pas l'air fan des piqûres.

translation.en: -Easy, Miss America. It's just a sedative. -We just need to get him under control.
translation.fr: Tout doux, Miss USA.C'est un calmant. On doit le maîtriser.

translation.en: He was under control.
No needles. No sedatives. Just back off.
I said, back off.
Okay, I get it, I get it. You like to be free. I get it.
translation.fr: Je comprends.Tu aimes être libre. Je comprends.

translation.en: What's your name?
-Zoe. -[Sam] Okay, Zoe.
Raven seems to really like you.
translation.fr: Raven a l'air de bien t'aimer.

translation.en: Could you help us get him back to the stables?
translation.fr: Peux-tu nous aiderà le ramener à l'écurie ?

translation.en: Uh, look, I would love to help you with your scary horse,
translation.fr: Je vous aiderais avec plaisiravec votre cheval,

translation.en: I really would, but I need to find my sister.
translation.fr: vraiment,mais je dois trouver ma sœur.

translation.en: Thing is, it's kind of you or the sedative.
translation.fr: En fait,c'est soit toi, soit le tranquillisant.

translation.en: Listen. If you help us out, we'll help you find your sister.
translation.fr: Écoute. Si tu nous aides,nous t'aiderons avec ta sœur.

translation.en: -Okay, what do you want me to do? -We need to get this rope clipped on him.
translation.fr: - D'accord. Qu'est-ce que je dois faire ?- On doit l'attacher.

translation.en: Oh, hey, hey. Shh, shh. Come here.
That's great. We need you to walk him back to the stables,
translation.fr: C'est super.Il faut que tu le ramènes à l'écurie.

translation.en: and we'll be right behind you. If he does anything, we are right there.
translation.fr: Nous serons derrière toi.S'il fait quelque chose, nous serons là.

translation.en: Okay, okay. All right.
Shh. It's okay, it's okay.
Couple of horse thefts on the mainland. It could be related.
translation.fr: Il y a des voleurs de chevaux.Ça pourrait être lié.

translation.en: [Mia] Horse thieves?
-I knew it. -He only said it could be.
translation.fr: - Je le savais.- C'est juste une piste.

translation.en: It must have been a gang.
It'd take at least four men, four big men, to control that horse. He's utterly wild.
translation.fr: Il faut au moins quatre hommes costaudspour contrôler ce cheval. Il est sauvage.

translation.en: [Mia] Daddy.
[Becky] This is so going on my blog.
translation.fr: Je vais poster ça sur mon blog.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Zoe. We've got it from here.
translation.fr: Merci beaucoup, Zoe.On s'en occupe, maintenant.

translation.en: [Marcus] Ted, can you give me a hand?
[Ted] Steady, boy.
Steady, boy.
[Sam] Take him to the stables and get him checked over.
[Zoe] See you soon... I guess.
[Sam] Okay, everyone, show's over. Let's get back to work.
translation.fr: C'est bon, le spectacle est fini.Au travail.

translation.en: -It was a false alarm, Officer. -It's Derek.
translation.fr: - Fausse alerte, M. l'agent.- Je m'appelle Derek.

translation.en: -[Sam] I'm so sorry to waste your time. -No time wasted.
translation.fr: - Je vous ai fait perdre votre temps.- Pas du tout.

translation.en: It's always good to see you. I mean, to see the yard.
translation.fr: Content de vous voir.Enfin, de voir le centre.

translation.en: Although I'd advise a review of your alarms and CCTV.
translation.fr: Mais je vous recommande de vérifiervotre système de vidéosurveillance.

translation.en: We'll look into it.
Yes, you will.
How's my favorite horse whisperer?
translation.fr: Ça va, celle qui murmureà l'oreille des chevaux ?

translation.en: I'm okay. I just need to find my sister.
translation.fr: Je vais bien.Mais je dois retrouver ma sœur.

translation.en: Right, of course.
Girls.
Wait, wait, wait.
These are Rosie's.
She's not out there. She's in here. Somewhere.
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas en vadrouille.Elle est ici.

translation.en: [Zoe] Seriously, I'm like some kind of wilderness tracker, right?
translation.fr: Je suis une sacrée pisteuse, non ?

translation.en: We'll help you look. We know all the best hiding places here.
translation.fr: On va t'aider à la chercher.On connaît toutes les cachettes.

translation.en: -Thanks, girls. -We were playing hide-and-seek once,
translation.fr: - Merci.- Un jour, on jouait à cache-cache,

translation.en: and I got stuck in a Portaloo.
translation.fr: je suis restée coincée dans les WC.

translation.en: -I thought she'd gone home. -I was in there for six hours.
translation.fr: - J'ai cru qu'elle était rentrée.- Pendant six heures.

translation.en: I got the best photo of you and Raven. Totally posting it.
translation.fr: J'ai une super photo de Raven et toi. Je vais la poster.

translation.en: "Mysterious Frenchwoman hypnotizes crazy horse."
I didn't hypnotize him.
[Jade] And she's not French.
-[Becky] It's still huge. -[Jade] Rosie?
Raven's the wildest horse in the yard.
translation.fr: Le cheval le plus sauvage du centre.

translation.en: What's his problem?
No one knows for sure.
He never lets anyone close enough to find out.
Apart from you.
Maybe he's your destiny.
-[Jade] Rosie, are you in here? -Maybe.
Rosie, are you--?
Hey, boy.
This really isn't a very good hiding place.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une bonne cachette.

translation.en: -Raven's in here, for starters. -It's okay. It's okay, it's just me.
translation.fr: - Raven est là.- Tout va bien, c'est moi.

translation.en: We should probably go.
-Careful. -It's okay.
So, I'm looking for my little sister.
She's a runaway, like you.
Here. See if he wants one of these.
translation.fr: Tiens. Essaie de lui donner ça.

translation.en: Ah, so, that's how you brought Raven home.
translation.fr: Donc, c'est comme çaque tu as ramené Raven.

translation.en: -You bribed him with sweets. -Told you it'd be something like that.
translation.fr: - Avec des friandises.- Je te l'avais dit.

translation.en: I mean, it is pretty impressive.
You know, you are the talk of the yard.
translation.fr: Tu es la star du centre équestre.

translation.en: -[chuckles] I am? -I'm Mia.
-I hope these two aren't bothering you. -No, no, they're cool.
translation.fr: - Ces deux-là ne t'ennuient pas trop ?- Non, elles sont sympa.

translation.en: We were helping her look for her sister.
translation.fr: On l'aide à chercher sa sœur.

translation.en: -I suppose you think Raven's eaten her. -Of course not. [chuckles]
translation.fr: - Tu as cru que Raven l'avait mangée ?- Mais non.

translation.en: -Have you? -[Mia] Run along. I can take things from here.
translation.fr: - Tu ne l'as pas mangée ?- Dégagez, je prends le relais.

translation.en: My dad practically owns the stables.
translation.fr: Mon père possède plus ou moins l'écurie.

translation.en: [Susie] We can show you how things really work around here.
translation.fr: On peut te montrercomment ça fonctionne, ici.

translation.en: -Take my number. We should hang out. -Oh.
Are you two still here?
[Jade] Bye, then.
-I hope you find your sister. -Wait, wait.
translation.fr: - J'espère que tu trouveras ta sœur.- Attendez.

translation.en: Uh, you know, my phone died.
-Oh. -Yeah, it does that sometimes.
Especially when people are being mean.
translation.fr: Surtout quand les gens sont méchants.

translation.en: -I don't think I get your meaning. -No, I think you do.
translation.fr: - Je n'ai pas bien compris.- Tu as très bien compris.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Girls, would you mind staying away from my horse?
He's had such a crazy day.
translation.fr: Il a passé une folle journée.

translation.en: Raven is your horse?
That's right, he's mine.
But don't worry,
there are plenty of other horses in the stables suitable for tourists.
translation.fr: il y a un tas d'autres chevauxparfaits pour les touristes.

translation.en: I can send you that photo, so you have something to remember him by.
translation.fr: Je peux t'envoyer la photopour que tu aies un souvenir.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
We'll have to go to the haystack. The Wi-Fi's strongest there.
translation.fr: Allons vers la grange.Le wifi fonctionne mieux, là-bas.

translation.en: You guys have Wi-Fi?
-What are you doing? -Oh.
Hey, sis.
I was just texting Angela and she said that they're having a really good time.
translation.fr: Je parle à Angela.Elle dit qu'elle s'éclate.

translation.en: We thought a wild horse had run off with you.
translation.fr: J'ai cruqu'un cheval sauvage t'avait enlevée.

translation.en: A wild horse? Get a grip, sis.
-You found her, then? -[Zoe] Yes. Now we're leaving.
translation.fr: - Tu l'as retrouvée ?- Oui. Et on s'en va.

translation.en: Why the rush?
Hi, my name's Rosie, but you can call me Rosie.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Rosie,mais tu peux m'appeler "Rosie".

translation.en: -Or just call me. -[chuckles]
Ignore her. Home. Now.
-Call me. -I'll see you around.
Oh, my God. Hot Marcus totally looked at your face.
translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu.Beau gosse Marcus t'a regardée.

translation.en: Don't most people look at your face when they're talking to you?
translation.fr: Les gens ne te regardent pas,quand ils te parlent ?

translation.en: I'd steer clear if I were you.
Mia's basically cocked her leg and peed on him.
translation.fr: Mia a comme qui dirait levé la jambeet pissé sur lui.

translation.en: -That's disgusting. -Excuse me.
What happened to "Home. Now"?
I'm coming.
Thank you guys so much. I'll see you later.
Wait.
Um, just wondering-- Maybe not.
You've probably got way better offers-- -She's asking for your number. -Oh.
translation.fr: - Tu dois avoir d'autres plans, mais...- Elle te demande ton numéro.

translation.en: You told Mia your phone was dead.
translation.fr: Tu as dit à Mia qu'il était cassé.

translation.en: Give me them digits.
Make sure you put all the sedatives back in the medical cabinet.
translation.fr: Range bien les tranquillisantsdans l'armoire à pharmacie.

translation.en: -Can't afford to buy more right now. -Yeah, of course.
translation.fr: - Je ne peux pas en racheter.- Bien sûr.

translation.en: -Luckily, we didn't have to use any today. -I know. Thanks to that girl.
translation.fr: - Heureusement qu'on n'a rien utilisé.- Je sais. Grâce à cette fille.

translation.en: -Zoe. -Right.
-I still can't get over it. -I know, she was amazing.
translation.fr: - Je n'arrive pas à m'en remettre.- Elle a été incroyable.

translation.en: I put Raven in the field. He was going crazy in his stable.
translation.fr: J'ai mis Raven dans le pré.Il devenait fou, enfermé.

translation.en: I'll bring him in before it gets dark. Better safe than sorry at the moment.
translation.fr: Je le ramènerai avant la nuit.Mieux vaut ne prendre aucun risque.

translation.en: [Zoe] Mom was really worried.
[Rosie] Mom gets worried if I walk under a ladder.
translation.fr: Comme quand je passe sous une échelle.

translation.en: [Zoe] Just because you can't get Wi-Fi, doesn't mean you can go off and disappear.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas parce que tu n'as pas de wifique tu peux disparaître comme ça.

translation.en: You know I feel funny when I can't get online.
translation.fr: Tu sais que je deviens folle,sans connexion.

translation.en: You are not a baby, Ro.
Then stop treating me like one.
translation.fr: Alors arrête de me parlercomme si j'en étais un.

translation.en: Dad chose not to come with us, didn't he?
translation.fr: Papa ne voulait pas venir, c'est ça ?

translation.en: No, he had work. You know that.
-He's busy. -Whatever.
translation.fr: - Il est occupé.- Si tu le dis...

translation.en: As soon as we get to Grandpa's, I'm Googling the Constitution.
translation.fr: En arrivant, je chercheraila Constitution sur Google.

translation.en: [Zoe] What the...?
-What? -Nothing.
I'm wondering why you didn't use the gate.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne passes paspar le portail ?

translation.en: Spying, are you?
Spying? No, I'm not spying. I'm just passing.
translation.fr: Moi ? T'espionner ? Non.Je passais par là.

translation.en: -I'm staying with my grandpa. -I know.
translation.fr: - Je vis chez mon grand-père.- Je sais.

translation.en: Have a look.
-What? -You obviously think I'm up to something.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Tu te dis que je prépare un coup.

translation.en: So, go on. Have a look.
-No, thanks. -Suit yourself.
[Zoe] Mysterious bags and boys coming out of bushes.
translation.fr: Des sacs mystérieux et des mecsqui sortent des buissons...

translation.en: Ah, this place has got it all.
translation.fr: Cet endroit a tout pour plaire.

translation.en: Looks like Frank's got guests up at the house.
-A woman and-- -The girl who brought the dark horse in.
translation.fr: - Une femme et...- La fille qui a ramené le cheval.

translation.en: -There's something about her. -Ah.
-The way she handled Raven, I mean... -[sighs]
translation.fr: Sa façon de parler à Raven...

translation.en: She's different.
A girl like that will break your heart given half a chance.
translation.fr: Elle te brisera le cœur,si tu lui en donnes l'occasion.

translation.en: -Who said I'd give her a chance? -I mean it, son.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi je ferais ça ?- Crois-moi, fiston.

translation.en: -Leave well alone. -What's it to you?
Her family are trouble.
You think everyone's trouble.
translation.fr: Tu dis ça de tout le monde.

translation.en: Don't say I didn't warn you.
[Maggie] Right, that's one very grubby daughter in the bath.
translation.fr: Ma fille dégoutante est dans son bain.

translation.en: -Where exactly did you find her? -The stables.
-The stables? -[Zoe] Mm-hmm. Yeah, they had Wi-Fi.
translation.fr: L'écurie ? Oui, ils ont le wifi.

translation.en: [chuckling] Poor you, having to deal with a bunch of pony princesses.
translation.fr: Ma pauvre, tu as dû discuteravec des petites princesses à cheval.

translation.en: No, they weren't--
Tomorrow I'll go into the village and set Grandpa up with the Internet.
translation.fr: Demain, j'irai au villagepour faire installer Internet.

translation.en: Oh, no. I don't need you coming over here, bringing all your new-fangled LA ideas.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin que tu débarquesavec tes idées dernier cri de LA.

translation.en: [laughs] It's not an LA thing. It's the whole world.
translation.fr: Il y a Internet dans le monde entier.

translation.en: -It's about time you caught up. -[sighs]
[Rosie] Mom, where's my strawberry glitter shampoo?
translation.fr: Maman ! Où est mon shampooing pailleté ?

translation.en: So, you liked the stables, then?
Yeah, yeah, I did.
[Frank] Bright Fields is a good place.
translation.fr: Bright Field est un bel endroit.

translation.en: I just hope young Sam can keep it going.
-Mom doesn't seem to think much of it. -[mutters]
translation.fr: - Maman n'a pas l'air passionnée.- Je sais.

translation.en: Maggie's always been more of a city girl.
translation.fr: Elle a toujours préféré la ville.

translation.en: Now, where were we?
[Maggie] What are you doing up here?
This better be good. I'm about to dive into a world of knights and ghosts and--
translation.fr: Quoi, encore ? Je m'apprête à plongerdans un monde de chevaliers et de...

translation.en: Vampire cats?
Myths and Legends.
I used to love that book when I was your age.
translation.fr: J'adorais ce livre, à ton âge.

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for today.
translation.fr: Je veux te remercier pour aujourd'hui.

translation.en: You've been a star.
-I'm sorry for being such a-- -Massively overprotective drama queen?
translation.fr: - Je suis désolée d'être...- Une mère ultra-protectrice ?

translation.en: I was gonna go with "concerned mom."
Having Rosie to chase round the island will give you something to do this summer.
translation.fr: Chercher Rosie partout sur l'île,ça va t'occuper.

translation.en: Mm, right after I come up with new and interesting ways to lie about Dad.
translation.fr: En plus de trouver de nouveauxmensonges sur papa.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Mom-- -It's okay.
Your dad and I just need a bit of time apart to figure out...
translation.fr: Ton père et moi avons besoinde nous éloigner...

translation.en: where we're going wrong.
Enjoy the book.
Thank you.
[Zoe] And now, finally, the total peace and quiet can begin.
translation.fr: Enfin du calme et du silence.

translation.en: No more panicking moms, no more lost sisters,
translation.fr: Plus de mère qui panique,plus de sœur perdue

translation.en: and no more dangerous wild horses.
translation.fr: et plus de cheval sauvage et dangereux.

translation.en: [Zoe] I said, no more wild horses.
[Zoe] Check me out, totally resisting.
translation.fr: Regardez ça. Je ne bouge pas d'un poil.

translation.en: Nope, mnh-mnh, not interested.
[Zoe] Ah... who am I kidding?
Hey, boy. Hey.
I just wanted to come and say good night.
We're famous.
Hey. What's wrong?
Is someone there?
Tch. It's okay. It's just you and me.
translation.fr: Tout va bien. Il n'y a que toi et moi.

translation.en: There's nothing to be scared of.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à avoir peur.

translation.en: I promise.
